title: 服务器常出现玩家大规模掉线的情况
txt_content:
如题，最近几天出现的比较频繁。一种是：
 Internal Exception: java.io.IOException: Error while write(...): Connection reset by peer
这种情况会有三分之一的玩家掉线

另一种是：
Internal Exception: java.net.SocketException: Broken pipe
这种情况一般服务器玩家全部掉线或者只剩一两个


请问应该从何处入手进行排查

replies.txt_content: 服务器安装的插件 Plugins (55): ClickLimit, YuLeMotd, GroupManager, EnchantExtreme, ColorChat, PermissionsDisable, MyBackpack, BanHighWater, NoBreak-Ms, Vault, BriberyMoney, AT, Chat, ChatLib, ColoredTags, PlayerPoints, ProtocolLib, BanItem, QuickShop, Anti_Nightvision, WorldEdit, NoCheatPlus, LockBlock, Mcrmb, ChopTreeW, PlayerHeads, ProtocolSupport, Marriage, CoreProtect, ASkyBlock, ForceWelcome, BannerMaker, Lockette, WorldNoDrop, DeathMessages, AutoSaveWorld, Essentials, ServerSigns, McrmbVip, Multiverse-Core, Shopkeepers, GreatFireWall, EssentialsChat, NeverLag, HolographicDisplays, Residence, McrmbShop, UltimateArena, EssentialsProtect, EssentialsSpawn, EssentialsGeoIP, EssentialsAntiBuild, RPG_Items, MyPet, AuthMe

replies.author: happybwm
replies.txt_content: 丢包严重 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-491106-1-1.html 这个插件试试吧

已自行解决。由于服务器使用了ProtocolSupport，所以AsyncKeepAlive用不了（自测会导致非1.8.8玩家无法进入服务器）。
发现服务器为了前期优化配置将网络压缩阙值设定过低，导致服务器资源占用过大。修改为512后正常。
